sentences.en: a documentary entitled ‘The Price of Perfection’
sentences.cn: 一部名为《完美的代价》的纪录片

sentences.en: Full-time employees are entitled to receive health insurance.
sentences.cn: 全职雇员都有资格享受健康保险。

sentences.en: Golden parachutes entitle them to a full year's salary if they get booted out of the company.
sentences.cn: 一旦被公司解雇，“金降落伞”协议使他们有权领取相当于一整年的薪水。

sentences.en: His services entitle him to our respect.
sentences.cn: 凭他的功劳他应受我们尊敬.

sentences.en: How does one entitle the queen when speaking directly to her?
sentences.cn: 直接同女王讲话时,我们该怎样称呼她 呢 ?

sentences.en: I am planning to write a book, I intend to entitle it The Journey Westward.
sentences.cn: 我准备写一本书, 打算将它命名为《西游记》.

sentences.en: If the warranty is limited, the terms may entitle you to a replacement or refund.
sentences.cn: 如果保修有限制，根据条款你也许可以要求退换或者退款。

sentences.en: Roosevelt's contributions to the science of administration alone would entitle him to distinction among the Presidents.
sentences.cn: 罗斯福对于管理科学的贡献,就足以使他成为一位出类拔萃的总统.

sentences.en: The documents which you have entitle you to drawback for duties paid.
sentences.cn: 你拥有的这些文件使你有权退税.

sentences.en: Their age and experience entitle old people to the respect of young people.
sentences.cn: 老年人由于他们的年龄和经验而得到年轻人对他们的尊敬.

sentences.en: They understood that our power alone cannot protect us, nor does it entitle us to do as we please.
sentences.cn: 他们懂得单凭实力无法保护我们的安全，实力也并不赋予我们随心所欲的权利。

sentences.en: This ticket doesn't entitle you to travel first class.
sentences.cn: 你这张票不能坐头等位.

sentences.en: Tickets of the Navigation Co. entitle the holder to break the journey at London and Paris.
sentences.cn: 该轮船公司的船票容许持票人在伦敦和巴黎滞留.

sentences.en: We adopt special lift technology; choose import bearing to entitle products with legerity and agility.
sentences.cn: 我们采用特殊的升降技术, 精选进口高速轴承,赋予产品轻巧与灵活.

sentences.en: We trust that our experiences in foreign trade marketing will entitle us to your confidents.
sentences.cn: 我方相信我们在外贸和推销方面的经验足以值得贵方的信任.

sentences.en: We will entitle you to a 10 % discount during July on anything you buy.
sentences.cn: 您7月份来买任何东西时,价格均可按9折优惠.

sentences.en: You may entitle this section Relevant Experience, Business Experience, Leadership Experience, etc.
sentences.cn: 你可以将这段命名为相关经历 、 工作经验 、 领导经验等.

words.tran_cn: 给…权利；给…定书名；授…以荣誉（entitle的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 使符合资格，给…命名，给予…权利
trans.tran_en: to give someone the official right to do or have something

trans.tran_cn: 授权； 给予权利； 给予资格； 给予称号； 给题名
trans.tran_en: to give someone the official right to do or have something
